glmt package¶

Submodules¶

glmt.constants module¶

Module with some of the physical constants used to calculate all kinds of properties used in other modules from this package.

@author: Luiz Felipe Machado Votto

glmt.field module¶

Module for representing fields in spherical and cartesian coordinates.

@author: Luiz Felipe Machado Votto

glmt.glmt module¶

Module responsible for the Generalized Lorenz-Mie Theory (GLMT) related computations. Beam shape coefficients and wave components are calculated here having the GLMT propositions in mind.

@author: Luiz Felipe Machado Votto

glmt.glmt.abs_phi_electric_i(radial, theta, phi, wave_number_k)[source]¶

Calculates absolute value of inciding phi component

Computes BSC in terms of degree and order

Calculates BSCs given specific frozen wave parameters

glmt.glmt.beam_shape_g_exa(degree, axicon=0.017453292519943295, bessel=True)[source]¶

glmt.glmt.beam_shape_mtx(degree, order, mode='TM', shape='3')[source]¶

Get BSCs from .mtx file stored in the mtx directory.

glmt.glmt.mie_coefficient_a(order, diameter=1e-05, permeability=1.256627e-06, sp_permeability=1.256627e-06, wavelength=1.0640000000000001e-06, reffractive=1.33)[source]¶

Obtains the value of Mie coefficient a_n.

Due to the magnitude of the denominator for sufficiently high orders, we treat the case where this denominator is too high or zero - which happens when its value is too high to be represented in a computer.

glmt.glmt.mie_coefficient_b(order, diameter=1e-05, permeability=1.256627e-06, sp_permeability=1.256627e-06, wavelength=1.0640000000000001e-06, reffractive=1.33)[source]¶

Obtains the value of Mie coefficient b_n.

Denominator is treated as in mie_coefficient_a.

glmt.specials module¶

Module for declaring special functions to be used in GLMT.

@author: Luiz Felipe Machado Votto

glmt.specials.legendre_tau(degree, order, argument)[source]¶

Returns generalized Legendre function tau

Derivative is calculated based on relation 14.10.5: http://dlmf.nist.gov/14.10

glmt.utils module¶

@author: Luiz Felipe Machado Votto
